original_text: The nethermost chamber was five cubits broad, and the middle was six cubits broad, and the third was seven cubits broad: for without in the wall of the house he made narrowed rests round about, that the beams should not be fastened in the walls of the house.
korean_text: 하층 다락의 너비는 다섯 규빗이요 중층 다락의 너비는 여섯 규빗이요 셋째 층 다락의 너비는 일곱 규빗이라 성전의 벽 바깥으로 돌아가며 턱을 내어 골방 들보들로 성전의 벽에 박히지 아니하게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: The nethermost chamber was five cubits broad
sentences.korean_translation: 가장 아랫층 방은 다섯 규빗 너비였고

sentences.original_text: and the middle was six cubits broad
and the third was seven cubits broad
sentences.korean_translation: 세 번째 층은 일곱 규빗 너비였습니다

sentences.original_text: for without in the wall of the house
he made narrowed rests round about
that the beams should not be fastened
sentences.korean_translation: 그 들보가 고정되지 않게 하기 위함이었습니다

sentences.original_text: in the walls of the house
